channel.title: Lets Be Scientists - YouTube Goodness.
channel.description:
Hey ladies and gents,
I know there's bound to be a few of these threads around, but i'm doing a LP of Black Mesa.
So, well, why watch me play it instead of playing it yourself? No reason what so ever, go play it if you're asking yourself that question!! :smiley:
However, i'm trying to start a little something on YouTube (just like everyone else these days). I played HL when it first came out and I've been waiting for a while to play BMP, all that's missing now is a Op Forces Source Remake and I'll be a happy chappy.
Anyway, If you'd like to check it out, here's my Channel: [url='https://www.youtube.com/user/SirPwnography']https://www.youtube.com/user/SirPwnography[/url]
The first episode is uploading now (I'm british therefore my upload is SHIT.) Check back and it should be up in a few hours or feel free to watch some of the other content. I thought i'd post this before I go to sleep.
Anyway, thank you for your time and far more importantly THANK YOU BLACK MESA PROJECT!! :smiley: :smiley: :smiley:
-- SirPwnography (yes, that name is meant in irony :wink: )

item.title: Lets Be Scientists - YouTube Goodness.
item.dc:creator: SirPwnography
item.description:
The first epi is now up, please watch and comment whether or not you’ve enjoyed it!

Thanks Guys.

<3
